title: Slowdive Announce 2025 North American Tour
description: The English shoegaze outfit will play a fresh run of shows starting in January. Slowdive Announce 2025 North American Tour Mary Siroky
author: Mary Siroky
excerpt: Slowdive have announced a new run of North American tour dates taking place in early 2025. et more details and ticket info here.
text: While the band is currently in the midst of their ongoing fall 2024 tour, Slowdive have already rolled out a fresh round of dates for early 2025. The newly announced North American tour will kick off in Toronto on January 25th; the band will spend two more nights in Canada with stops in Ottawa and Montreal. The additional round of US dates is concentrated in New England — January and February will see the English rockers hit cities in Vermont, Massachusetts, New Jersey, and more. See the full list of dates below. Get Slowdive Tickets Here An artist pre-sale is planned for Wednesday, November 20th at 10:00 a.m. ET. This will be followed by a Live Nation pre-sale on Thursday, November 21st at 10:00 a.m. ET; access it by using code BEATS. Then, tickets will become available to the general public via Ticketmaster on Friday, November 22nd at 10:00 a.m. ET. In the meantime, last-minute tickets for the upcoming 2024 dates are still available. As we once again approach end-of-year time, revisit our 2023 roundup to see where the band’s everything is alive landed on our best albums list. Slowdive 2024 – 2025 Tour Dates: 11/19 – Brooklyn, NY @ Brooklyn Paramount 11/21 – Pittsburgh, PA @ Stage AE 11/22 – Columbus, OH @ KEMBA Live! 11/23 – Royal Oak, MI @ Royal Oak Music Theatre 01/25 – Toronto, CA @ Massey Hall 01/26 – Ottawa, CA @ Bronson Centre 01/28 – Montreal, CA @ L’Olympia 01/30 – South Burlington, VT @ Higher Ground 01/31 – North Adams, MA @ Massachusetts Museum of Contemporary Art 02/01 – Portland, ME @ State Theatre 02/02 – Boston, MA @ Something In The Way Festival 02/04 – New Haven, CT @ College Street Music Hall 02/05 – Sayreville, NJ @ Starland Ballroom 02/07 – Port Chester, NY @ The Capitol Theatre 04/10 – London, UK @ O2 Academy Brixton
html:
While the band is currently in the midst of their ongoing fall 2024 tour, Slowdive have already rolled out a fresh round of dates for early 2025.

The newly announced North American tour will kick off in Toronto on January 25th; the band will spend two more nights in Canada with stops in Ottawa and Montreal. The additional round of US dates is concentrated in New England — January and February will see the English rockers hit cities in Vermont, Massachusetts, New Jersey, and more. See the full list of dates below.

Get Slowdive Tickets Here

An artist pre-sale is planned for Wednesday, November 20th at 10:00 a.m. ET. This will be followed by a Live Nation pre-sale on Thursday, November 21st at 10:00 a.m. ET; access it by using code BEATS. Then, tickets will become available to the general public via Ticketmaster on Friday, November 22nd at 10:00 a.m. ET.

In the meantime, last-minute tickets for the upcoming 2024 dates are still available.

As we once again approach end-of-year time, revisit our 2023 roundup to see where the band’s everything is alive landed on our best albums list.

Slowdive 2024 – 2025 Tour Dates:
11/19 – Brooklyn, NY @ Brooklyn Paramount
11/21 – Pittsburgh, PA @ Stage AE
11/22 – Columbus, OH @ KEMBA Live!
11/23 – Royal Oak, MI @ Royal Oak Music Theatre
01/25 – Toronto, CA @ Massey Hall
01/26 – Ottawa, CA @ Bronson Centre
01/28 – Montreal, CA @ L’Olympia
01/30 – South Burlington, VT @ Higher Ground
01/31 – North Adams, MA @ Massachusetts Museum of Contemporary Art
02/01 – Portland, ME @ State Theatre
02/02 – Boston, MA @ Something In The Way Festival
02/04 – New Haven, CT @ College Street Music Hall
02/05 – Sayreville, NJ @ Starland Ballroom
02/07 – Port Chester, NY @ The Capitol Theatre
04/10 – London, UK @ O2 Academy Brixton
